import React, { useState, useEffect, useRef } from 'react'; import profilePic from './assets/profile.jpg'; import './index.css'; const App = () => { const [showCerts, setShowCerts] = useState(false); const [zoomImage, setZoomImage] = useState(null); const [isChatOpen, setIsChatOpen] = useState(false); const [messages, setMessages] = useState([ { role: 'assistant', content: 'Hello! I\'m your portfolio assistant. I can help you learn more about Saikrishna Badiger, his skills, projects, and experience. How can I help you today?' } ]); const [inputMessage, setInputMessage] = useState(''); const [isLoading, setIsLoading] = useState(false); const mainRef = useRef(null); const chatEndRef = useRef(null); // Scroll to bottom of chat when new messages arrive useEffect(() => { chatEndRef.current?.scrollIntoView({ behavior: 'smooth' }); }, [messages]); useEffect(() => { const handleKeyDown = (e) => { if (!mainRef.current) return; if (e.key === 'ArrowRight') { mainRef.current.scrollBy({ left: window.innerWidth, behavior: 'smooth' }); } else if (e.key === 'ArrowLeft') { mainRef.current.scrollBy({ left: -window.innerWidth, behavior: 'smooth' }); } }; window.addEventListener('keydown', handleKeyDown); return () => window.removeEventListener('keydown', handleKeyDown); }, []); return (
{/* Bio Slide */}

Saikrishna Badiger

"Turning data into decisions | Code into creations"

Aspiring Data Analyst | Cloud | DevOps | Web

Open to Work & Internships

Swipe or use keys

Email GitHub LinkedIn

Click on the Gmail link to connect directly I'm always open to opportunities and meaningful conversations!

Download Resume
{/* About Slide */}

About Me

I'm a passionate Computer Science student (20222026) at Adichunchanagiri Institute of Technology with strong foundations in Java, Python, Data Structures, and Web Development.

I enjoy building real-world software, solving complex problems, and constantly learning new tools especially in the fields of Cloud, DevOps, and Machine Learning.

I'm seeking exciting opportunities where I can grow as a Data Analyst or Software Developer, contribute to impactful projects, and collaborate in dynamic teams.

What sets me apart is my curiosity-driven learning and hands-on experience building end-to-end projects.

{/* Skills Slide */}

Skills

{/* Technical Skills */}

Technical Skills

  • Java, Python, C++, C
  • DSA
  • HTML, CSS, JavaScript
  • MySQL
  • OpenStack, GCP
  • GitHub, Linux
  • VS Code, LaTeX
{/* Soft Skills */}

Soft Skills

  • Communication
  • Teamwork
  • Problem-Solving
  • Adaptability
  • Time Management
  • Presentation Skills
{/* Projects Slide */}

Projects

Brain Tumor Classification

ResNet50-based classification of MRI images.

Python, TensorFlow, OpenCV

GitHub

Status: In Progress

Homestay Management System

Eco-friendly homestay booking system.

HTML, CSS, JS, MySQL (XAMPP)

Status: Completed

Quiz Web Application

Quiz platform with learning and part-time job features.

HTML, CSS, JavaScript, Python (Django)

Status: Completed

{/* Certifications Slide */}

Certifications

  • Programming in Java Certification by NPTEL - 2025
  • Machine Learning Certification by NPTEL 2025
  • Frontend Developer Certification Great Learning 2024
  • Hackathon Participation 20242025
  • IEEE Conference Volunteer Certificate 2024
{showCerts && (
{[ 'ieee-volunteer.jpg', 'nptel-java.jpg', 'nptel-ml.jpg', 'hackathon-ait.jpg', 'hackathon-team-vortex.jpg', 'frontend-css.jpg' ].map((img, i) => ( setZoomImage(`${process.env.PUBLIC_URL}/certifications/${img}`)} className="cursor-zoom-in rounded-xl shadow-lg w-full h-64 object-contain bg-slate-800 p-4 border border-cyan-400/30 hover:border-cyan-400/60 transition-all duration-300 hover:shadow-cyan-500/30" /> ))}
)}
{/* Contact Slide */}

Contact

Email: vishwakarmasaikrishna@gmail.com

GitHub: github.com/sai-krishna26

LinkedIn: linkedin.com/in/saikrishna-badiger-063a9a314

{/* achievements section */}

Achievements

  • Successfully built and presented a deep learning project on Brain Tumor Classification using ResNet50 as part of final year academic work.
  • Participated in inter-college Hackathons and contributed to innovative project ideas and team collaboration.
  • Volunteered at IEEE International Conference 2024, assisting with event coordination and tech support.
  • Earned certifications in Java, Machine Learning, and Frontend Development from NPTEL and Great Learning.
  • Developed and deployed a portfolio website showcasing skills, projects, and certifications using React and GitHub Pages.

{/* Chat Header */}

{/* Chat Input */}
{ e.preventDefault(); if (!inputMessage.trim() || isLoading) return; const userMessage = inputMessage.trim(); setInputMessage(''); setMessages(prev => [...prev, { role: 'user', content: userMessage }]); setIsLoading(true); try { // For demo purposes, using a mock response // In production, you would call OpenAI API here const response = await processUserQuery(userMessage); setMessages(prev => [...prev, { role: 'assistant', content: response }]); } catch (error) { setMessages(prev => [...prev, { role: 'assistant', content: 'Sorry, I encountered an error. Please try again or contact me directly.' }]); } finally { setIsLoading(false); } }} className="flex space-x-2" > setInputMessage(e.target.value)} placeholder="Ask about my portfolio..." className="flex-1 px-3 py-2 border border-cyan-400/30 rounded-lg focus:outline-none focus:ring-2 focus:ring-cyan-500 focus:border-transparent bg-slate-700 text-white placeholder-gray-400" disabled={isLoading} />
)}
© 2025 Saikrishna Badiger. All rights reserved.
); }; // Helper function to process user queries (mock implementation) const processUserQuery = async (query) => { const lowerQuery = query.toLowerCase(); // Simulate API delay await new Promise(resolve => setTimeout(resolve, 1000)); if (lowerQuery.includes('skill') || lowerQuery.includes('technology') || lowerQuery.includes('tech')) { return "Saikrishna has strong technical skills in Java, Python, C++, C, Data Structures & Algorithms, HTML/CSS/JavaScript, MySQL, OpenStack, GCP, GitHub, Linux, VS Code, and LaTeX. He also excels in soft skills like communication, teamwork, problem-solving, adaptability, time management, and presentation skills."; } if (lowerQuery.includes('project') || lowerQuery.includes('work')) { return "Saikrishna has worked on several projects: 1) Brain Tumor Classification using ResNet50 (Python, TensorFlow, OpenCV) - In Progress, 2) Homestay Management System (HTML, CSS, JS, MySQL) - Completed, 3) Quiz Web Application (HTML, CSS, JavaScript, Python Django) - Completed. All projects are available on his GitHub."; } if (lowerQuery.includes('experience') || lowerQuery.includes('background')) { return "Saikrishna is a Computer Science student (2022-2026) at Adichunchanagiri Institute of Technology. He's passionate about Cloud, DevOps, and Machine Learning. He's seeking opportunities as a Data Analyst or Software Developer where he can contribute to impactful projects and grow professionally."; } if (lowerQuery.includes('certification') || lowerQuery.includes('certificate')) { return "Saikrishna has earned several certifications: Programming in Java (NPTEL 2025), Machine Learning (NPTEL 2025), Frontend Developer (Great Learning 2024), Hackathon Participation (2024-2025), and IEEE Conference Volunteer Certificate (2024)."; } if (lowerQuery.includes('contact') || lowerQuery.includes('email') || lowerQuery.includes('linkedin')) { return "You can contact Saikrishna at vishwakarmasaikrishna@gmail.com. He's also active on GitHub (github.com/sai-krishna26) and LinkedIn (linkedin.com/in/saikrishna-badiger-063a9a314). He's always open to opportunities and meaningful conversations!"; } if (lowerQuery.includes('resume') || lowerQuery.includes('cv')) { return "Saikrishna's resume is available for download on his portfolio. It contains detailed information about his education, skills, projects, certifications, and achievements. You can download it using the 'Download Resume' button on the main page."; } if (lowerQuery.includes('education') || lowerQuery.includes('degree') || lowerQuery.includes('college')) { return "Saikrishna is currently pursuing a Bachelor's degree in Computer Science at Adichunchanagiri Institute of Technology (2022-2026). He's in his final year and has maintained a strong academic foundation in programming, algorithms, and software development."; } if (lowerQuery.includes('achievement') || lowerQuery.includes('accomplishment')) { return "Saikrishna's key achievements include: Successfully building a Brain Tumor Classification project using ResNet50, participating in inter-college hackathons, volunteering at IEEE International Conference 2024, earning multiple certifications, and developing this portfolio website using React and GitHub Pages."; } return "I'm here to help you learn more about Saikrishna Badiger! You can ask me about his skills, projects, experience, certifications, contact information, resume, education, or achievements. What would you like to know?"; }; export default App;
